column1: # This file is used for mapping grib identifiers to FMI identifiers.
# Add the name of this file into the "grid-files.conf" file so that the programs
# Mapping "standard" grib identifiers (defined in the "grib_parameters.csv" file) into
# our own FMI identifiers (defined in the "ext/fmi_parameters.csv" file).
# Surface runoff in depth of water in metres
# Subsurface Runoff in depth of water in metres
# Runoff in depth of water in metres
# Water equivalent of accumulated snow depth (deprecated) (kg m-2)
# 196:Northward gravity wave surface stress (N m-2 s)
# 210:Surface net solar radiation, clear sky (J m-2)
# 211:Surface net thermal radiation, clear sky (J m-2)
# 228100: Evaporation from the top of canopy (m of water equivalent)
# 228101: Evaporation from bare soil (m of water equivalent)
# 228102: Evaporation from open water surfaces excluding oceans (m of water equivalent)
# 228103: Evaporation from vegetation transpiration (m of water equivalent)
# 198: Skin reservoir content (m of water equivalent)
